mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GD.SPRINGBOARD (SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, STEP, "DEPTH", REFER, READCOUNT, DELFLAG, REGDATE) VALUES(SPRINGBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{content} ,(SELECT STEP+1 FROM SPRINGBOARD s2 WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) ,(SELECT "DEPTH"+1 FROM SPRINGBOARD s3 WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) ,(SELECT REFER FROM SPRINGBOARD s WHERE SEQ=#{seq}) , 0, 'N', SYSDATE)
